page.title: 04Housing 2
page.content: { % Types of Dwelling These are the types of houses in the villages and their percentage propor- tion: {Type of Dwelling % Retirement homes 2% Semi-detached bungalows 2% Terraced houses 10% Semi-detached houses 12% Detached houses 36% Detached bungalows 38% { Future Development At present there are ten new bunga- lows being built in Clover Rd.There are further plans to develop land either side of a road that would loop around the playing field,cut through allotments there and join Station Rd. and Clover Rd.It is estimated that a further 100 dwellings could be erected there ensuring Willoughby's future.
